data.actual_result: There is two categories, "In the Call" and "Not in the Call" even if no one is in the call. Do note, if you restart your client.. your client will start the call for some odd reason.
data.expected_result: Group Overview should show all members with "Members in the Group"
data.short_description: Group Overview Displays that there is a call going on when no one is in the call.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a group call in iOS - Exit to the home screen. - Go to your desktop client, join the call then end the call once the iOS red banner for the call has disappeared. - Come back to the iOS Client - Go to the Group Overview. - Observe
